thread.title: Ghana striker Majeed Waris vies for Lorient Player of the Month
thread.title_full: Ghana striker Majeed Waris vies for Lorient Player of the Month

title: Ghana striker Majeed Waris vies for Lorient Player of the Month
text:
01:40 CET Ghana striker Majeed Waris vies for Lorient Player of the Month - www.ghanasoccernet.com Majeed Waris 
Ghana striker Abdul Majeed Waris is on a four-man shortlist for FC Lorient's September Player of the Month award. 
He must beat competition from Jouffre Yann, Benjamin Jeannot and Cameroon's Benjamin Moukandjo. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
